input_email_body:
Subject: Problems with Microsoft Surface Pro 8 Operation

Facing issues while writing reports on my Microsoft Surface Pro 8 You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. The device struggles to run QuickBooks and Excel 2021 smoothly My name is Maria Gonzalez.. I've already attempted a restart and reinstallation of the software, but the problem continues. I suspect there might be software conflicts or insufficient system resources. I would greatly appreciate your prompt assistance in resolving this issue. Could you please guide me on the next steps to troubleshoot and resolve the problem? I am available to provide any additional information needed.
